name: endpointApps
description: Extension for partner endpoint applications that can onboard, control, and communicate with the device.

subAttributes.name: client-tokens
subAttributes.description: This attribute contains a list of tokens that the client will used to authenticate itself.  Each token may be a string up to 500 characters in length.

subAttributes.name: enterpriseEndpoint
subAttributes.description: The URL of the enterprise endpoint which device control apps uses to reach enterprise network gateway. When enterprise receives the SCIM object from onboarding app, it adds this attribute to the object and sends back the object as response back to the onboarding app.
